tool_description: Convert text to meaningful emojis using AI
title: Text to Emoji convert

api_list.name: your text prompt
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-emoji-convert.p.rapidapi.com/emoji/{text}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-emoji-convert.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
